actionTemplate.title: Sword Brow
steps: Make the arch pronounced with an angular 'break' and a sharp tail
Draw a firm lower line, then an angled top line
Deepen and extend the tail for a 'blade' feel
Keep the front lighter so the brow isn't too heavy
Blend and sharpen edges with concealer for crisp angles

rationaleTemplate: Angular structure adds a bold, strong presence.
Great for androgynous looks or strong facial structure makeup.
